title: Video Killed the Radio Star but Can Give New Life to Advisor Practices
description: Advisors should leverage technology to grow their business or risk falling behind, says Mike Byrnes, founder and president of Byrnes Consulting.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Advisors should leverage technology to grow their business or risk falling behind, says Mike Byrnes, founder and president of Byrnes Consulting.
